name: Avatly
description: Avatly is the World's first fashion metaverse mall integrated with a mobile app, located on an ultra-realistic virtual tropical island, where users can create their own realistic avatar as simply as taking a selfie. Avatly takes the shopping experience into a new dimension by trying on, sharing, and buying clothes in the metaverse. Avatly is dedicated to cooperating directly with the best fashion brands and retailers. The technology used to build our mall is powered by the Unreal 5 gaming engine and the AVA utility token is based on Binance's Smart Chain Blockchain. People who are working behind the scenes are strongly experienced in e-commerce, blockchain, 3D design, marketing and fashion. In addition to shopping, Avatly will also offer a social platform where you can meet new people and hang out with friends in a variety of virtual environments (on the beach, places to relax or even in the jungle). There will also be a variety of fun, and interactive games to play (earn, rewards for challenges sponsored by our partners). Bring people together and create unique experiences that cannot be found anywhere else. Avalty is a one stop shop for your fashion, gaming and social needs!
